*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Fire}} }} ==Description== The '''Flame Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Flame Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Fire Gems]] {{Gem|Fire}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Flame Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Sunburst Island|Epic}} {{LootItem|Burned Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Tin Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Fiery Path|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Mt.
